experiences.description: Led the club to meet goals and received recognition as the recipient of the coveted "Best Affiliate Award" out of 60+ affiliates. Planned club development, handled issues, and communicated with club committees around the university.
Assisted the club chairperson in managing and organizing club activities. Conducted activities that allowed members to learn new things and showcase their talents.

achievements.title: 25th INTIMA Most Outstanding Council Member
achievements.description: Recommended and successfully selected as the most outstanding council member by the 25th INTI Student Government (INTIMA) & Student Services Department (SSD).

achievements.title: 26th INTIMA Most Outstanding Council Member
achievements.description: Recommended and successfully selected as the most outstanding council member by the 25th INTI Student Government (INTIMA) & Student Services Department (SSD).
